subject: Add sample image pagination and update docs to match current app
body:
- Sample images: pagination (15/page), horizontal scroll for category chips
- USER_GUIDE: add Context Bar, multi-page, reader mode, freeform text mode;
  move Sample Images to Media tab; update header controls and export options
- TutorialModal: add sample images, freeform mode, multi-page, reader mode
- TESTING_GUIDE: update M0 test for pagination and category scroll

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add sample image pagination and update docs to match current app
